alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 7:48AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marshall, southeastern Roseau, northwestern Beltrami and southwestern Lake of the Woods Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 748 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gatzke, or 27 miles south of Roseau, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grygla, Gatzke, Norris Camp, Hayes Lake State Park, Carmel, Malcolm and Casperson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau
